2009940.name: Forgotten Legends
2009940.description: Face off in a legendary event! As an ‘Ancient’ you will battle for supremacy and domination. Use your ‘Ancient’ magic to control legends from another universe for power, or to survive the destruction! As the World surrenders to the chaos you may stand alone against the forces of evil. Send your 5 bravest Legends and collect more to improve your team, as you need power to stop the destruction and chaos! Battle to level 5, and create or join a clan. Increase your network of other ‘Ancients’ to rise the ranks in competitive play. With other game modes to come later!
